title: Telford & Wrekin Council launches free AI support programme for small businesses

title: Apple used AI to uncover new blood pressure notification feature in Watch
description: Apple Watch Series 11 models that go on sale on Friday can notify users that they may have high blood pressure, in a feature the company has powered using artificial intelligence rather than a blood pressure monitor.
content: SAN FRANCISCO, Sept 19 (Reuters) - Apple Watch Series 11 models that go on sale on Friday can notify users that they may have high blood pressure, in a feature the company has powered using artificial intelligence rather than a blood pressure monitor... [2435 chars]

description: Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) has become one of the most talked-about tools in the creative industry.
